title: Modern & Tranquil Tuscan Spa Town Retreat with Spa Credit & Welcome Drink
description:
Connect with yourself in the tranquil wellness retreat of Palazzo BelVedere, a restored hotel in one of Italy's largest spa towns, Montecatini Terme. Discover immaculate details, historic architecture, healing waters and culinary delights just 40 minutes from Florence, with the Tuscan landscape as your spectacular backdrop. Take an enriching wellness journey by indulging in the bespoke spa treatments designed to encourage a holistic health strategy between you and your environment, and choose only the best in food to enhance your inner peace.

Start each morning in the Lux Salon where a breakfast buffet is spread across tables showcasing fresh produce and sourdough croissants. In the evening, NO|MORE restaurant has crafted traditional plates highlighting organic and seasonal produce accompanied by natural wines for a harmonious night of dining.
